choices: Jessica's 1-piece swimming suit
Jessica's Flower-Girl Dress (tomorrow is your mom's wedding)
Kari's Flip-Flop
Jessica's Birthday cake (she is turning 6 tomorrow)
Jessica's tights
1.content:
"Austin, I'd like to run more BSM experiments on you," your mom says.
"Fine," you sigh.

The two of you go downstairs.
"Choose," states your mom.

You choose...
1.title: Choices

choices: At the pool
11.content: You walk over to the machine and sit down in the chair. Your mom then straps you in. You wonder why because there is not much worse that she could do that she hasn't already done. Then you she what she sets on the other side. Its your 5 year old sister Jessica's one-piece bathing suit. You shout no, but your mom hits the switch. You blank out then wake up unable to move or talk but only see and feel. You see your mom look down at you and say "Honey, I'm sorry, but I found that I could transfer living objects into non-living objects and I wanted to try it out. Unfortunately, the machine has a 24 hour wait time after doing it so you are stuck like this. Luckily, you won't be alone as we are going to the pool today!" Then your mom turns around and yells for Jessica to come get her bathing suit. She comes down and puts you on then you go out the door to the pool.
11.title: Jessica's Swimsuit

choices: the beach
the pool
13.content:
Your mother sits you down on the seat and straps you in. tightly. Rather unnecessary, you think. You volunteered this time.

"So, who am I swapping with, then?" you ask, feigning enthusiasm.

"No one," your mother replies.

"What do you mean by that?" you ask nervously.

"You'll see," she smiles.

She reaches into a box and pulls out a single shoe. It is a brand new pink flip flop. She places it in the other seat and attaches probes to it. Your mother flicks the switch

"Wait!" you try to call, but it's too late. You feel a slight pain, and then you faint.

As you wake up, you are at a totally new perspective. You can't move your body at all. You keep facing straight up. All you see is a strap. A giant face high above you enters your vision. It is your mother. Either she has grown huge, or you have shrunk.

"Hello there!" she smiles. Her giant hand picks you up like you are nothing. She turns to the mirror. You see your mother holding a flip flop in her hand. No one else is around. Suddenly you realize. YOU ARE THE FLIP FLOP. You try to scream but no sound escapes your new inanimate body. Your mother then turns your face to meet hers.

"I bet you're wondering what happened. Well, I recently found out that the BSM was capable of transferring a human consciousness into a non-human body. Naturally I wanted to test the limits of it so I used you. Sorry about that." She turns you around so quickly you feel like barfing. You see your body, motionless still on the chair.
"Your body is on stand by. This is what we're gonna do. The BSM needs 24 hours to cool down. So you're stuck like this until then. But don't worry, you won't be lonely or bored. You're gonna be worn by Kari.

Your mom picks you up and takes you upstairs. She puts you next to the door with the other flip-flop, then calls Kari down. Kari puts you on, crushing you, then walks out and gets into the car. Kari then drives to...
13.title: Kari's Flip-Flop

choices: You regain control of your thoughts
Your thoughts seem to slip further
You begin to worry because you're starting to like being a flip flop!
132.content: Kari drives all the way to the pool, pedal to the metal, which puts a lot of pressure on your face as her foot is smothering you. "Why did I agree to this?" You think to yourself. She finally reaches the pool & gets out of her car & walks to the pool area. Walking is even worse than her driving to you. She finds s nice spot to put her stuff at & takes you off. "Now don't go running off anywhere" she tells you jokingly as she dives in the water. You're just stuck there, unable to move, when suddenly you realize you miss her foot on you. "Wait, NO!" You say, as you try to stop the thoughts of being a flip flop over ruling your own. "I hope I get changed back soon" you think as your mind starts drifting off again.
132.title: the pool

choices: Give in & enjoy your new life
Try to get things back to normal
The flip flop in your body talks to you
1322.content:
Just when you thought it was done, your thoughts drift off again as you think "When will she get back? I'm so bored! I need her foot on me to keep me occupied!" You then break free again, "NOOO!" You control yourself again as your Kari gets out & puts you back on to go home.

A long 24 hours after the swap had been constant battling with your thoughts. Your mom came up to you & said "I have this mind reader here so we can communicate, tell me how you feel." Just as you were about to tell her, you lost control of your thoughts, "I love it mom! Being on Kari's beautiful feet is the best! It's so easy being a flip flop, actually, could I be her flip flop forever?" Your mom is stunned and says "That means the flip flop will get your body & life, are you sure?" You try to say no but all that comes out is "Yes, I love this life!"

She then says "Suit yourself" & flips the switch to make it permanent & then *POOF*, it's all over. Your life, everything. You begin to cry mentally as you realize your fate has been sealed. You now have the life of a flip flop. Now & forever.
1322.title: Your thoughts seem to slip further

choices: Give in & accept your life as flip flops
Fight to get your body back!
13223.content:
Your mind begins racing as you realize you're now permanently Kari's flip flop. Everything up until this point that you've done has been pointless. All the effort you put in, only to be given to an inanimate object to work with as you're stuck like this..

Just then, you see movement out of the corner of your vision, as the moving object gets closer you're struck with pure horror. It was you're body, grinning evilly. Your body bent down and asked your mom and Kari for a moment. As they left the room, your body looks back and you. "I know you don't want this. It's just without a complex mind like a human has, you're giving in to your new lot in life. I'm sorry you have to deal with this, but as long as I have a say, this is my body and you're just the flip flop. Hope you enjoy that life more than I did! Summers are lovely by the way. The sweat, the smell, the.. well, you get the point. See ya!" As you body walked away, you're stunned by what it just said as you could only sit there and think to yourself silently. "This can't happen this way!" You scream mentally. "I'm not just a flip flop! I'm.. I'm.. wait, where's master? I wish to hold her feet dearly!" You suddenly realize what you just said. Before you could even think, Kari walks back in and says "Hope you liked your chat! Back to work for you!" As she slipped you on, you screamed but the screaming subsided as you felt at peace and happy. "No! I don't want this! Why did this happen to me? Why do I have to be the one being worn on feet.." You begin to feel defeated. "Is this it?" "Should I give in?" These thoughts crossed your mind. Time to decide.
13223.title: The flip flop in your body talks to you

choices: Skip forward to full on summer time
Fast forward a week
Beginning to accept his new life
132231.content: You decide to give in. You can’t fight it, your sisters flip flops won. They have the nice luxuries of being a human while you’re just an object to be worn, nothing more. It upsets you to realize this is what you are now but you want to make the best of it. As you’re sulking about your new life, Kari comes back and picks you up. “You know, it’s kind of odd you wanted to stay as nothing but a flip flop but it’s whatever!” she said to you. “I guess from here on out I’ll just treat you as you are, a flip flop. Hope you enjoy!” as she dropped you to the ground with a plop. She slid her dainty foot back on you and you were right back to where you didn’t want to be. Wrapped around your sisters foot, your only purpose now..
132231.title: Give in & accept your life as flip flops

choices: Stay as a flip flop
Swap with Kari’s big toe
The machine messes up!
1322312.content: A week had passed since I became my sisters flip flop and it’s been a rough one. All the foot falls, the sweat I absorb, just everything about my new life sucks. I also get tormented by my old body about how being human is great and they fell sorry for me but I know it’s a lie. My mind is alot weaker then before, but that’s because I’m just rubber with no brain. Super complex thoughts hurt me and I am no more than a simple minded being stuck as my sisters shoe. My sister picked me up a week after the permanence and offered me a deal. “Austin, I know you must hate it in there by now. Tell you what, mom taught me how to use the machine as well as the mind reader so when we get home you have two options. Either stay as the flip flop you are or you can have you soul swapped into my right big toe. Think about it and let me when when we get home!” as she put me back on I realized how my life sucked. I could either be a flip flop or my sisters big toe... Neither seemed ideal but I had to decide.
1322312.title: Fast forward a week

choices: After the machine explodes
13223123.content: When you get home you tell her you want to be her big toe and she laughs. “That’s funny! This going to be great!” Before you could change your mind, she took off the mind reader set you in one seat and put her big toe in the other. She flipped the switch but all of a sudden lights started flickering and the machine started buzzing. Suddenly it exploded! The aftermath is permanent with the machine broken, but what exactly happened?
13223123.title: The machine messes up!

132231231.content: When you wake up, you feel strange but you don’t know what happened. Suddenly you feel yourself moving but not on your own, then you hear your sisters voice “Wha-what happened? Wait.. I’m.. I’m human?!” and your heart began to sink. The one person who could report the swap had been swapped as well! But where did Kari end up? And what were you?? Suddenly, she sat up and looked straight down at you “Wow, I sure did look weird and small. Can’t believe I use to be just a toe! Being human feels great! I don’t know who you are, but good luck as a toe! Ooo! I know, why don’t I get you accustomed by painting your nail? Might as well get you used to your new life. I figured it out at that point. It was a 3 way swap. Kari’s big toe swapped into her body, Kari became her own flip flop and I sadly became her big toe. She started walking which felt so weird compared to being a shoe, ad she left poor Kari back still on the chair probably freaking out about her new permanent life as her own shoe. Not too much better for me.. As we got to her room, she pulled out her nail polish and said “Purple sounds lovely! Enjoy your new life toe. You’ll be pretty in just a minute don’t worry!” As she started painting me, it felt so odd but satisfying. I suddenly was seeing purple and she told me I looked “cute”. As she finished up the other toes, she put me in front of a mirror and there I was.. A big bulbous toe with a purple coating of nail polish on me. How could I live with this? This is terrible! But as I thought that. All my mind shut down. I stopped thinking and my thoughts were replaced by thoughts of toe. I started enjoying my reflection and my new life. Hopefully Kari enjoys being her flip flop forever! I’ll enjoy being this nice big toe! I’m so pretty.
132231231.title: After the machine explodes

choices: Refuse!, the sandal uses you all night long for its pleasure
You accept, you'll make a plan later
132232.content:
There's nothing you can do as a flip flop to get your body back, some days passed and you are getting used to your new routine, being under your sister's foot, she has nice feet and keeps them clean in consideration of his ex brother who now serves her foot.
Still you need to find a way to get your body back.
During the night, you are next to your sister's bed, from your position you can see her foot slipping out of the bed sheets while she sleeps, it twitches, almos like it tries to thank you for all the work you do for it.
Then, the sandal appears and puts you on your old foot the it quietly walks away to your old room
"Did I felt that nice on others feet when I was you? Because you feel so good on my feet!"
The sandal teases you, as it sits on the edge of you old bed and starts dangling you.

"Listen... I've really enjoyed your body these last days.. the sensations are amazing and having feet myself is so nice...also having a....well you know what I'm talking about!"
The sandal says as it lightly puts his hands on your old crotch
"But the thing is, I was a girls flip flop and a Male body is not exactly what I wanted.. plus, it was your sister the one that always used me on her feet! I almost feel bad taking your body! So.. why don't you help me take her body to show her what is to be under her ugly foot?..I mean you would get your body back.. and we could keep it as a secret, I would even let you play with her feet that you already bonded with as a flip flop! I think you really liked feet because with this body I can barely keep my eyes off of them!"
This may be your only chance to be human again so you...
132232.title: Fight to get your body back!

choices: As a cake
14.content:
"I wonder what it would like to to be food" you say thinking over your choices.
"Ok the cake it is" your mom says as she throws you into the the seat and straps you into the seat.
"No wait i hadn't decided yet" you stammer but its too late. Your mom hits the button and you black out.
14.title: Jessica's Birthday cake (she is turning 6 t...

choices: Turned you into a pair of socks for jessica
New shoes for jessica
Other
141.content:
You wake up ontop of the table. You couldnt scream or move at all. Atleast you could look around. You saw how your mom sticks 6 candles into your face. It felt like she was sticking needles in you. She lit them up and places a couple of presents around you.

"Come on kids lets celebrate!" Your mom shouted. Soon jessica came down. She was dressed like a princess. She had a pink dress on and a self made crown onto her head. She said down and stared at you. A couple of seconds after jessica came kari. She sat down and smiled at her smaller sister.
They start to sing happy birthday for jessica. After that she blew the candle out and everyone clapped. Afterthat your mom grabbed a knife and start cutting you into pieces. It felt like she would cut your arms off. You could see everyones face as they start to eat. You felt every bite they did. You felt a great pain. You were so scared that you are gonna die soon but then your mom pressed the button and...
141.title: As a cake

info.brief_description: The streamlined version of this story, you switch bodies with an inanimate object.
info.description:
Main Characters:

You: Austin, 15 yrs. old
Mom: Carol, 49 yrs. old
Little Sister: Jessica, 5 yrs. old
Older Sister: Kari, 18 yrs. old

Rules: No swearing
no texting language
no sex descriptions
use proper grammar and spelling
have fun!
info.pretty_title: The Time I Was an Inanimate Object v. II
